job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a full-stack engineer who thrives on complex challenges and is eager to make a real impact? Join our team to contribute to innovative products that deeply leverage AI, changing the way we work and learn.

   Join us to work on our exciting product portfolio:
     * TeachTap: Bringing historical figures to life using AI, offering an engaging, TikTok-like learning experience to make learning more relevant and fun.
     * Educational Content Generation: Utilizing the latest in generative AI combined with comprehensive learning materials to create captivating content.
     * TeachTower: A game-based motivation system inspired by popular games like Roblox and Minecraft, designed to make learning irresistibly fun.
     * Coachbot: A learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, guiding learning paths, recommending next steps, and rewarding daily progress.

   What we offer:
     * The opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies, including the latest in Angular, React, React Native, and AWS serverless patterns.
     * The opportunity to learn and experiment with using generative AI to boost your productivity.
     * A team of exceptionally talented engineers from around the world as your peers.
     * The chance to work on products that are making a real difference in people's lives.

   We're not just using AI as a buzzword. We're at the start of a thrilling journey with generative AI, experimenting and learning to fully leverage its potential and free our engineers from mundane tasks, allowing them to focus on what truly matters: design, decision-making, and understanding the far-reaching implications of different implementation strategies.

   Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
     * Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Engineer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Are you a full-stack engineer who thrives on complex challenges and is eager to make a real impact? Join our team to contribute to innovative products that deeply leverage AI, changing the way we work and learn.

   Join us to work on our exciting product portfolio:
     * TeachTap: Bringing historical figures to life using AI, offering an engaging, TikTok-like learning experience to make learning more relevant and fun.
     * Educational Content Generation: Utilizing the latest in generative AI combined with comprehensive learning materials to create captivating content.
     * TeachTower: A game-based motivation system inspired by popular games like Roblox and Minecraft, designed to make learning irresistibly fun.
     * Coachbot: A learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, guiding learning paths, recommending next steps, and rewarding daily progress.

   What we offer:
     * The opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies, including the latest in Angular, React, React Native, and AWS serverless patterns.
     * The opportunity to learn and experiment with using generative AI to boost your productivity.
     * A team of exceptionally talented engineers from around the world as your peers.
     * The chance to work on products that are making a real difference in people's lives.

   We're not just using AI as a buzzword. We're at the start of a thrilling journey with generative AI, experimenting and learning to fully leverage its potential and free our engineers from mundane tasks, allowing them to focus on what truly matters: design, decision-making, and understanding the far-reaching implications of different implementation strategies.

   Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
     * Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and application of generative AI technologies, including LLMs, for creating engaging educational products like TeachTap, TeachTower, and Coachbot. It highlights building RAG systems (implied by 'Coachbot: A learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, guiding learning paths, recommending next steps') and fine-tuning/leveraging generative AI for content creation. While it mentions full-stack development and AWS, the core focus and innovative aspects are centered around generative AI applications, aligning with the definition and responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly mentions 'Utilizing the latest in generative AI' for content creation and 'experimenting and learning to fully leverage its potential' with generative AI. The product descriptions for TeachTap (bringing historical figures to life using AI) and Coachbot (learning copilot) also strongly imply the use and development of generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Utilizing the latest in generative AI

job_tasks.justification: The role involves building applications that leverage AI, such as 'TeachTap: Bringing historical figures to life using AI' and 'Coachbot: A learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, guiding learning paths, recommending next steps, and rewarding daily progress.' This indicates the application and potential fine-tuning or adaptation of AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Bringing historical figures to life using AI

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Coachbot: A learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, guiding learning paths, recommending next steps, and rewarding daily progress.' This implies the development or integration of AI models that can provide guidance and recommendations, characteristic of generative AI applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Coachbot: A learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, guiding learning paths, recommending next steps, and rewarding daily progress.

job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly states 'Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools' and mentions technologies like Angular, React, and React Native, which are core to front-end web application development.
job_tasks.phrase: Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools

job_tasks.justification: The job involves 'Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS,' which is a direct description of backend software development and integration with cloud services.
job_tasks.phrase: Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.

job_tasks.justification: The responsibility to 'Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements' is a standard software development practice.
job_tasks.phrase: Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'AWS serverless patterns' and the emphasis on 'cloud-native backends' suggests involvement in deploying and managing applications on cloud infrastructure, which is a component of MLOps for cloud-based AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.

job_tasks.justification: The job description highlights making a 'real impact' and changing 'the way we work and learn,' and discusses 'understanding the far-reaching implications of different implementation strategies,' indicating a need to align technical work with broader goals and consequences.
job_tasks.phrase: changing the way we work and learn

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'understanding the far-reaching implications of different implementation strategies' suggests a need to consider the broader impact and strategic alignment of technical decisions.
job_tasks.phrase: understanding the far-reaching implications of different implementation strategies
